metadata.name: Copy Passwd Or Shadow From TMP Path
metadata.comment: Detects when the file "passwd" or "shadow" is copied from tmp path

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/cp')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/tmp/')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('passwd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('shadow'))))

output.summary: Detects when the file "passwd" or "shadow" is copied from tmp path
